title: CYCLOPS
content:
Although this may bring groans of boredom, I would like to know if anyone can identify this font from the cover of the Albert Watson photography book “CYCLOPS”? Did David Carson design it or someone else?

Many Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105813im_/http:/typophile.com/files/davidcarson-cyclops_4099.jpg.jpeg)
author: navigate

comments.content: Looks like it says David Carson in the lower left corner.

_Looks like it says David Carson in the lower left corner._

Well, the book itself was designed by David Carson. (I have it.)
Yeah I have the book too, but never could determine where the font came from or what it was called.
